text: Ne nibakhamala eda yabu, mubakalushile mumenye ninabo khubulayi, nohomba mubaleshe nomulembe, ne mulaanje abaloli abesikwa mwinywe, ne mukhole obuloli khulwa Nyasaye, endio nilwa mulachilwa khu balia basuubila Nyasaye nende inyanga imalilishi, ne uria Nyasaye, alamukholela obwangu bwokhurula mumatinyu
